LANDING_PAGE.INTERNET_ISSUES_DESCRIPTION: My Wi-Fi is slow or causing problems
LANDING_PAGE.OTHER_ISSUES_DESCRIPTION: I am facing issues will all service
LANDING_PAGE.PASSWORD_ISSUES_DESCRIPTION: I want to change or reset my password
LANDING_PAGE.RESET_PIN_DESCRIPTION: I want to reset my PIN

QUICK_LINKS.INSTALL_NEW_ROUTER: I want to install my new router
QUICK_LINKS.FACTORY_RESET_ROUTER: I want to factory reset my router
QUICK_LINKS.FACTORY_RESET_TV: I want to factory reset my TV box
QUICK_LINKS.CONNECTION_ISSUE_ROUTER: I am unable to connect device(s) to my router’s Wi-Fi
QUICK_LINKS.FORGOT_PASSWORD_TV: I forgot my TV box PIN
QUICK_LINKS.TRANSFER_PACKAGE_TV: I want to transfer eLife TV package to another TV box
QUICK_LINKS.CONNECT_HOME_ZONE: I am unable to connect to Home Zone
QUICK_LINKS.TRACK_COMPLAINT: I want to track a recent complaint

QUICK_LINKS.UPGRADE_PACKAGE: I want to upgrade my eLife package

TEXT.FOLLOW_UP_QUESTION: Do you want to follow-up the request?

LINKS.COMPLAINT_ANOTHER: No, I want to report another issue

MESSAGES.THANKYOU_BODY: Thank you for using Self-care. Hope we could make your experience better.
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION: We are moving your eLife connection
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION_BODY_1: The service will be discontinued while the transfer is under process.
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION_BODY_2: Try using it once your eLife connection has been moved successfully.
MESSAGES.ACCOUNT_TEMPORARILY_DISCONNECTED_BODY: The service won’t work as your account has been disconnected temporarily based upon your request. The service will be back on <XXX>. Click here if you want to reconnect your service.
MESSAGES.ELIFE_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PROGRESS: You eLife service cancellation request is in progress
MESSAGES.ELIFE_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PROGRESS_BODY: The service won’t work as your account is being cancelled based upon your request.
MESSAGES.COMPLAINT_ALREADY_EXISTS_BODY: Our technicians are already working on resolving the issue. Do you want to follow-up on the same complaint?
MESSAGES.APPOINTMENT_BOOK_SUCCFULLY_Body: We have received your complain and booked an appointment. Our technician will contact you soon

TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PARA1: By accepting the T&C, you confirm that all information by you is correct and you bear responsibility if there will be any discrepancy in the documents and will liable for the action.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PARA2: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

ROUTER_RESTART.RESTART_ROUTER_H2: You can follow these steps to reboot your router
ROUTER_RESTART.RESTART_ROUTER_H3: Consult device care for specific device guides
ROUTER_RESTART.ROUTER_DIDNOT_RESTART_H2: Follow these steps to restart your router
ROUTER_RESTART.ROUTER_DIDNOT_RESTART_H3_MSG: Where you can find more details on how to restart your router.

DIALOG.PASSWORD_WASNOT_RESET_DESCRIPTION: Please note that the issue won't be fixed until the password is changed and the router is configured with the new password
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_CONTINUE: Once you complete these steps, tap 'Continue'.
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_EXIST_TROUBLESHOOTING: If you want to complete these steps later, tap 'Exist troubleshooting'.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS1: Please note that the issue won't be fixed until you restart your router.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS2: You can also restart your router manually.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS3: Once you restart your router, wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.

LOADER.SUCCESS_BODY_1: Please wait while our automated system is diagnosing the service.
LOADER.SUCCESS_BODY_2: This will take up to 1 minute
LOADER.FALIURE_BODY: It is taking longer than expected. Kindly wait
